ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation

Class NavigationWithObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation.NavigationWithObstacle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class NavigationWithObstacle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class deals with the navigation system of the robot.
    Author:
    Sandra Deng

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,

        Parameters:

        y: - the y coordinate of the point

      • navigateToSearchingArea

        public void navigateToSearchingArea(int LL_X,
                           int LL_Y,
                           int UR_X,
                           int UR_Y,
                           int corner,
                           int SZ_X,
                           int SZ_Y)
        This method will navigate the robot to pass the tunnel and reach the lower left corner of the searching area.
        Parameters:
        LL_X: - x coordinate of the lower left corner of the tunnel
        LL_Y: - y coordinate of the lower left corner of the tunnel
        UR_X: - x coordinate of the upper right corner of the tunnel
        UR_Y: - y coordinate of the upper right corner of the tunnel
        corner: - corner number of the starting point
        SZ_X: - x coordinate of the lower left corner of the searching area
        SZ_Y: - y coordinate of the lower left corner of the searching area
